titleStmt.title: Despatch from L de R du Verge to Robert S. Newton, November 26, 1883

bibl.title: Despatch from L de R du Verge to Robert S. Newton
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p:
Robert S. Newton Esq.
U.S. Vice Consul
St Paul de Loanda
I send this by the SS Benguella, Capt. Brown and hope it will reach you

Before my departure from Banana I gave to Mr Bloeme two cheques on Hon: Secretary of the Treasury No 7. $350 and No 8. $174 both to your order, after paying yourself of $50 per month for your trouble and deducting the amount paid to Marti and for the firebars piston cover lamp shade and seed you will please forward the balance to me in a cheque "30 days if you pease" to No 1 Sefton Grove, Sefton Park, care of Chas. Williams Liverpool as I will remain there for some time before going home. Dispose of my maxilla also, every cent I can get now is needed my trip and continuous sickness are breaking me down
Good luck to you and good health
